summary: A group of Marines must protect a US Embassy in the Middle East when it suddenly comes under attack from enemy forces.
cast: Scott Adkins|Charlie Weber|Dante Basco|Romeo Miller|Erik Valdez|Sasha Jackson|Dennis Haysbert|Tom Ainsley|Stephen Hogan|Joe Corrigall|Hadrian Howard|Charlie de Melo|Kalina Stoimenova|Ed Spila|Hristo Balabanov|Vlado Mihailov|Jay Moses|Raymond Steers|Raina Karayaneva
title: Jarhead 3: El asedio
